title: Lockheed Martin Opens New Small Satellite Factory
summary: In a strategic move to meet the growing demand for small satellites, Lockheed Martin has unveiled a cutting-edge satellite assembly facility at its Waterton campus near Denver, Colorado.

title: NanoAvionics completes LEO satellite for studying black holes
summary: NanoAvionics is preparing to ship a nanosatellite slated to launch this fall to study black holes and neutron stars from low Earth orbit, the Lithuanian manufacturer announced Aug. 7.

title: Lockheed Martin’s data-transport satellite clears design review
summary: A communications satellite designed by Lockheed Martin for the Space Development Agency passed a critical design review, the company announced Aug. 7.

title: SpaceX closes in on launch record with most recent Starlink launch
summary: 22 V2 mini Starlink satellites are well on their way to their operational orbits today following last night’s successful launch atop a...

title: RFA Secures €30m Investment From KKR
summary: Rocket Factory Augsburg (RFA), a prominent launch service provider has successfully secured a substantial €30 million investment from KKR, a renowned global investment firm.

title: NASA Sets Coverage of Roscosmos Spacewalk Outside Space Station
summary: NASA will provide live coverage beginning at 10:15 a.m. EDT Wednesday, Aug. 9, as two Roscosmos cosmonauts conduct a spacewalk to upgrade the International Space Station. The spacewalk is expected to begin about 10:45 a.m., and last up to seven hours.

title: NASA InSight Study Finds Mars Is Spinning Faster
summary: Data sent by the spacecraft before it retired last December has provided new details about how fast the planet fast rotates and how much it wobbles.

title: TROPICS cubesat constellation ready for hurricane season
summary: A quartet of cubesats launched in May to monitor the development of tropical storm systems is working just in time to support monitoring of the Atlantic hurricane season.

title: Benchmark unveils driver assistance features for satellites
summary: Benchmark Space Systems intends to offer satellite operators the type of driver assistance popular in automobiles.

title: Frontgrade acquires Aethercomm
summary: Frontgrade Technologies, a Veritas Capital, announced the acquisition June 8 of Carlsbad, California-based Aethercomm.
